summary: This document is an email forwarding a Daily Beast article from April 16, 2019, titled 'REVEALED: We Found Billionaire Pedophile Jeffrey Epstein's Secret Charity Here's Who It Gave Money To'. The email highlights media reporting on Epstein's previously undisclosed charitable foundation and its financial beneficiaries.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded Daily Beast article which investigates his secret charity and its financial recipients. He is referred to as a 'billionaire pedophile'.

events.title: Daily Beast article on Epstein's secret charity
events.description: The Daily Beast publishes an investigative article revealing the existence of Jeffrey Epstein's secret charity and detailing who received money from it.

keyFacts: A Daily Beast article from April 16, 2019, investigated Jeffrey Epstein's secret charity.
The article's purpose was to reveal the existence of this charity and identify its financial beneficiaries.
The email forwarding the article characterizes Epstein as a 'billionaire pedophile'.
